import React from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; const PoForm = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({}); const handleChange = ({ target }) => { const newData = { ...data } newData[target.id] = target.value; setData(newData) }; return (
# Product Name Price Quantity Total
1 Mark ৳ 100 ৳ 500
); } export default PoForm;
